['DescriptionLuxhabitat is pleased to offer this one-bedroom apartment in the unique Address Sky Views.
The unit boasts an area size of 883 square feet. This apartment is for those looking for pure elegance and luxury and is finished to the highest standard. It is fully furnished to a five-star specification and comes with a modern and contemporary living area, a fully fitted kitchen with top-quality appliances and an extra powder room for the guests.  
Topping the tower complex is a one-of-a-kind Sky Bridge that features a signature restaurant, ballroom and stunning infinity pool with 360-degree panoramic views of Downtown Dubai and the Gulf. This unique feature makes it one of the most iconic developments in Dubai. Stylishly designed with top-notch facilities, all the 520 apartments arrive fully-furnished with a touch of elegance. 
Residences at Address Sky View reflect careful attention to every nuance of comfort and elegance, while matchless perspectives of the city beckon from the infinity pool above. Innovation and culinary finesse are essential ingredients that elevate each of the novel dining experiences, while wellness is delivered holistically via spa and fitness experiences characterised by new-age thinking.']
